content: You are in the meeting room. You are about to discuss what the theme for sprit week on Friday will be.
f{name_b}: Hi, {name_a}, what do you think should be the theme for spirit week?
What theme do you think would be great for spirit week this Friday, John?

I think we should have a "Formal Day" as the theme for spirit week on Friday. It would be a great opportunity for everyone to dress up and have some fun with a more formal attire. What do you all think?
